snippet: The New York Philharmonic took care of some business before featuring a debut by the conductor Juraj Valcuha and yet another performance by the pianist André Watts.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews performance by New York Philharmonic, featuring debut of conductor Juraj Valcuha and accompanied by pianist Andre Watts, at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The New York Philharmonic took care of some business before featuring a debut by the conductor Juraj Valcuha and yet another performance by the pianist André Watts.

headline.seo: New York Philharmonic at Avery Fisher Hall
headline.main: The Familiar Shares the Stage With a Debut
headline.print_headline: The Familiar Shares The Stage With a Debut
